item.description: Kay suggested this meetup yesterday at lunch. We'll be getting together to have an open discussion on financial issues and matters. Questions such as how do you find a financial advisor you'd like to work with and what is the general feeling about the market right now. We can find a facilitator to lead the discussion or do you have someone you'd like to recommend. This is a social networking dinner with a themed discussion - - - we will not permit any solicitation or recommendations.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Dinner and Finances
